meanings.sent1: I accidentally stepped on a cowpat in the field.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used a shovel to clean up the cowpat.
meanings.sent3: The cowpat looked like a pancake in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The cowpat in the meadow was a brown disc of fertilizer.
meanings.sent5: The sun baked the cowpat, creating a hard, round disc.

meanings.sent1: The cowpat smelled unpleasant in the barn.
meanings.sent2: The fields were dotted with cowpats from the grazing cows.
meanings.sent3: The naughty dog rolled in the cowpat and needed a bath.
meanings.sent4: The cowpat on the path was a reminder of the farm animals nearby.
meanings.sent5: The flies buzzed around the fresh cowpat, attracted by the smell.
